key_talking_points: Penalty on Edmonton.  Player Evan Bouchard (EDM) called for tripping at 3:32 of the first. Florida to the power play, already leading 5-4.
The one-goal game early in the first period suggests a potentially high-scoring affair. Both teams have been active offensively.
for_commentary_agent.context: The momentum is moderate due to the penalty and several shots/hits. The game is close, but early in the period. Mixed coverage allows for both play-by-play of key events and analysis of the game situation.

game_context.game_situation: One goal game; early first period

task_details.specific_guidance: Focus on the Florida power play and Edmonton's penalty kill. Briefly discuss the scoring pace of the game so far.
